definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.chinese: 你在关系中习惯受虐么？

sentences.english: And we willingly take it in hour after hour, day of day, like some kind of self-hating masochists.
sentences.chinese: 而我们情愿地像受虐狂一样不断地每天订阅它。

sentences.english: In this sense, sadism is merely the disavowal of masochism.
sentences.chinese: 以这个意义来说，虐待狂仅仅是受虐狂的不被承认。

sentences.english: You see one of them at the level of masochism.
sentences.chinese: 你们看到其中一样，在受虐狂的层次。

sentences.english: Leroy H Pelton cites a number of studies that have found a strong link between poverty and child abuse.
sentences.chinese: 根据佩尔顿研究指示贫困和受虐儿之间的连结关系。

sentences.english: Now then observe that I began with the masochist. It was the more difficult;
sentences.chinese: 现在请你们观察一下，我从这个受虐狂患者开始。

sentences.english: In some cases, women return to abusive relationships because they feel sorry for their abusers.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情况下，女人因歉疚而回归受虐家庭。

sentences.english: She forgives him as part of their sadomasochistic relationship.
sentences.chinese: 她原谅他作为他们的悲哀的受虐狂者关系的一部分。

sentences.english: These appeal to men who are interested in sadomasochism.
sentences.chinese: 这些广告会吸引对施虐受虐癖感兴趣的男人。

sentences.english: Little girls would all grow up to become masochists with daddy complexes.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩长大后会成为有恋父情结的性受虐狂。
有些人会称呼其为受虐心态。

sentences.english: The pain is associated with arousal resulting in patterned masochism.
sentences.chinese: 疼痛与唤起相结合导致了受虐。

sentences.english: What do you think, I'm a masochist?
sentences.chinese: 你以为我是什么，受虐者？

sentences.english: He cannot force you to indulge in sadomasochism.
sentences.chinese: 他不能逼迫你沉迷在于性受虐中。

sentences.english: Trying and failing is funny. Masochism is not.
sentences.chinese: 尝试和失败很有趣，但受虐可不有趣。

sentences.english: Ouch . Child abuse can cause long-lasting changes in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 童年受虐会导致大脑发生长期的改变。

definition: to torment/to abuse (an animal, child etc)
(slang) (pun on 神經病|神经病[shen2 jing1 bing4]) crazy person/nutjob
